Title: Software Developer
Description: Develop and maintain web applications using JavaScript, React, and Node.js.
Requirements: 2+ years of experience in web development

Title: Graphic Designer
Description: Create visual concepts and designs for marketing materials, websites, and social media.

Title: Project Manager
Description: Manage software development projects and coordinate teams to ensure timely delivery.
Requirements: 5+ years of experience in project management

Title: Data Scientist
Description: Analyze complex data sets to drive business insights and support decision-making.
Requirements: 3+ years of experience in data analysis

Title: Marketing Specialist
Description: Develop and implement marketing strategies to promote products and services.

Title: Cybersecurity Analyst
Description: Monitor and protect company systems from cyber threats and vulnerabilities.

Title: Human Resources Manager
Description: Oversee HR operations, including recruitment, employee relations, and benefits management.
Requirements: 5+ years of experience in HR management

Title: Mechanical Engineer
Description: Design, develop, and test mechanical systems and products.
Requirements: 3+ years of experience in mechanical design

Title: Content Writer
Description: Create engaging content for blogs, articles, and social media.
Requirements: Bachelor's degree in English or Communications
2+ years of experience in content writing

Title: Supply Chain Coordinator
Description: Manage the supply chain process, including procurement, logistics, and inventory control.
Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain Management
3+ years of experience in supply chain management
